mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, displayname, profile_picture_path, email, role_id, active_session_jti, is_deleted) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{displayname}, #{profilePicturePath}, #{email}, #{roleId}, #{activeSessionJti}, #{isDeleted})
INSERT INTO approval_requests (user_id, req_message, assigned_admin_id, is_approved) VALUES (#{userId}, #{reqMessage}, #{assignedAdminId}, #{isApproved})
